title: [FR] Design a form
saveP1: [FR] We don’t save your form on our website, but don’t worry, you can save the file to your computer.
saveP2: [FR] Save the form file to work on later, and open it again to pick-up where you left off.
saveH2: [FR] Save the form file on your computer
saveP3: [FR] Click the save button to download your form.
saveH3: [FR] Upload the form file again to edit
saveP4: [FR] Open the form file from the GC Form Builder’s start page to pick-up where you left off.
shareP1: [FR] Your form is not saved on this website. To share it, you need to save it to your computer and send it to your co-workers.
shareP2: [FR] The people you share it with can open the file to preview or make changes to the file.
shareH2: [FR] Save the form file on your computer
shareP3: [FR] Click the save file button to download your form.
shareP4: [FR] Email the form file to your co-workers and let them know they can preview or edit it from the GC Form Builder’s start page.
startFormIntro: [FR] Add a description to your form to set expectations for those filling it out.
startP1: [FR] Create a new form from scratch
startP2: [FR] Revisit and edit an existing form file you saved from your last session
startErrorParse: [FR] Failed to parse file, not valid JSON
settingsReponseHint1: [FR] Provide a Government of Canada email address to send form responses to.
settingsReponseHint2: [FR] In order to publish, you need to provide a response delivery destination.
settingsFormatHint: [FR] What is the original form format you are designing from?
settingsDeleteHint: [FR] Once you delete a form, there is no way to retrieve it back again. Please save a copy before deleting your form.
